articles.author: HT Sports Desk
articles.title: ‘Eleven months is…’: AUS legend's no-nonsense statement on Bumrah's comeback - Hindustan Times
articles.description: The legendary Australian pacer feels Jasprit Bumrah can make an instant impact for Team India despite missing the entire home season.  | Cricket
articles.content: Brimming with confidence as the hosts of the showpiece event, Rohit Sharma's Team India will enter the ICC World Cup 2023 as favourites if pace ace Jasprit Bumrah regains his form in the lead-up to t… [+3103 chars]
